metadata.title: CVE-2020-2224 jenkins-2-plugins/matrix-project: Stored XSS vulnerability in single axis builds tooltips (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Matrix Project Plugin version 1.16 and prior. Node names shown in tooltips are not escaped on the overview page of builds with a single axis which could lead to a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. The user must have the Agent/Configure permission for this exploit to function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
